name: IEWarn
author: Matthew Trescott
description: Adds a warning when a user is using Internet Explorer or Microsoft Edge.

config.___comment___: The styling below is based on the KDE Breeze Color palette and the SuperTuxKart wiki theme.
config.OuterBoxStyle: background-color: #f47750; padding: 10px; padding-left: 20px; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif; font-weight: bold;
